q: What taxes does the app calculate?
a: The app supports Corporate Income Tax (CIT), Value Added Tax (VAT), Withholding Tax (WHT), Pay As You Earn / Personal Income Tax (PAYE/PIT), Stamp Duty and common payroll taxes. It covers major business and personnel taxes for Nigerian taxpayers.
By default your data is stored locally on your device and encrypted. You may opt into cloud backup which uses AES-encrypted storage. We never share personally identifiable data without consent.

q: Can I use the app offline?
a: Yes. Core calculators, saved records and reminders work offline. When you regain connectivity any pending syncs will be uploaded if you enabled cloud sync.

q: How do I pay my tax?
a: The app generates payment instructions and optional payment links that work with Remita, Flutterwave, or Paystack (where configured). You can export a PDF receipt or send a confirmation email after payment.

q: Can I invite my accountant or team?
a: Yes. The Pro and Business tiers support multi-user access and accountant invites; Business tier adds team roles and audit logs.

q: What happens if tax rules change?
a: We monitor official guidance and push rule updates in app releases. Critical rule updates are flagged in the app; keep auto-updates enabled to stay current. Always verify before filing.
The Basic tier provides CSV and watermarked PDF exports. Pro and Business tiers include official-format PDF reports and Excel exports.
Contact support via the in-app support link or email support@taxng.example. Subscription cancellations stop further billing at the end of the current period; contact support for exceptions.
